title: iPhone 7 Ready Headphones!
description: ICYMI -   This video features the Audeze Sine lightning capable headphones. These are one of the first iPhone 7 ready headphones (assuming the iPhone 7 ditches the 3.5mm audio jack). The advantage of lightning is the ability to integrate a amp + dac directly into the headphones. This allows you to bypass your phone's built in amp.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -

They have a lightning connector, so it goes straight into the lightning port. What can happen is the amp and dack can be in the actual headphone rather than the phone.
